name: SpaceWar (itch) (BlueOxel)
description:
Hey!
I'm BlueOxel, 3D artist.
But in 2018 I was trying to make some games. And this one- my only game.
This page was made for saving that game.

WASD for move
Space for shoot
Left corner- score
Right corner- waves
Alt+f4- exit

Fully free to use (I guees) and enjoy!
